name: PANGS
description:
You are awake. It feels as though you have been asleep for a long time. You do not know where you are or even who you are. You are only sure of one thing: you are hungry.

PANGS (you are hungry.) is a short interactive story with 5+ possible endings.

Overview
- 1024x768 resolution
- ~9,000 words
- 15-20 minutes playtime
- 5+ endings (3 "bad", 2+ "true")
Credits
Sound Effects: freeSFX.co.uk, musmus
Music: Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

Reviews
"...the writing in this one is perfectly freaky in a good way." - Jayisgames
"The emotional struggle the protagonist feels is very well conveyed through the text, and the small details shown in the pictures help to get into the story." - AdventureGamers

Having trouble? A walkthrough is available here!
